Html:
Hi, radioman.

First of all, thanks for a great tool.

Please, help: how implemented placemark cache?
Is it store only in *.plc files or it store it database also?
For exmaple, in my aplication I have about 35000 *.plc files in PlacemarkCache folder.
Is it a normal situation? Maybe, these files can store in database?
Will I have any problem with performance in the future?

Thanks you.
